item.title: SSC Junior Hindi Translator JHT 2024 Vacancy Details
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> SSC Combined Hindi Translators Examination JHT 2024 SSC Combined Hindi Translators Examination JHT 2024 Staff Selection Commission (SSC) Short Details of Notification SSC JHT 2024 Exam : Important Dates Application Begin: 02/08/2024Last Date for Apply Online: 25/08/2024Pay Examination Fee Last Date: 25/08/2024Correction Date: 04-05 September 2024Exam Date: 09/12/2024Exam City Details: 30/11/2024Admit Card Available: 04/12/2024Answer Key Available: 12/12/2024Vacancy Details Available: 10/02/2025 Application Fee General / OBC: 100/-SC / ST / PH / Female: 0/- (Nil)Pay the Examination Fee Through Net Banking, Debit / Credit Card or Through E Challan Mode of State Bank of India.

item.title: SSC CHSL 2024 Option Form
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> SSC Combined Higher Secondary Level CHSL Examination (CHSLE) 2024 SSC Combined Higher Secondary Level CHSL Examination (CHSLE) 2024 Staff Selection Commission (SSC) Short Details of Notification SSC CHSL 10+2 Exam 2024 Important Dates Application Begin: 08/04/2024Last Date For Registration: 07/05/2024 upto 11 PM OnlyOnline Payment Last Date: 08/05/2024Correction Date: 10-11 May 2024Online Exam Date Paper I: 01-11 July 2024Answer Key Available Paper I: 18 July 2024Result Available Paper I: 06/09/2024Marks Available Paper I: 16/10/2024Paper II Exam Date: 18/11/2024Answer Key Available Paper II: 26/11/2024Option Form Available: 04/02/2025 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS: 100/-SC / ST / PH: 0/- (Nil)All Category Female: 0/- (Exempted)Pay the Exam Fee Through Online Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Fee Mode Only.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment Exam Dates
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has relased General Duty GD Constable Notification 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this SSC GD Constable CAPFs, NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles Examination,2025 can apply online from Dates 05/09/2024 to 14/10/2024. Read the SSC GD Constable 2024 SSC GD Constable 2024 Exam City Details

item.title: SSC Mts 2024
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> SSC 10th Pass Multi Tasking (Non-Technical) Staff, and Havaldar (CBIC & CBN) Examination 2024 SSC 10th Pass Multi Tasking (Non-Technical) Staff, and Havaldar (CBIC & CBN) Examination 2024 Staff Selection Commission (SSC) Short Details of Notification SSC Matric Level MTS Exam 2024 Important Dates Application Begin: 27/06/2024Last Date for Apply Online: 03/08/2024 upto 11 PMPay Fee Online Last Date: 04/08/2024Correction Date: 16-17 August 2024CBT Exam Date Paper I: 30/09/2024 to 14/11/2024Answer Key Paper I: 29 November 2024Result Paper I: 21/01/2025Paper II Exam Date: Notified Soon Application Fee General / OBC / EWS: 100/-SC / ST: 0/-All Category Female: 0/- (Exempted)Pay the Exam Fee Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Mode.

item.title: SSC CGL 2024 Tier II Admit Card
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> SSC Combined Graduate Level CGL Recruitment 2024 SSC Combined Graduate Level CGL Recruitment 2024 Staff Selection Commission (SSC) Short Details of Notification SSC CGL 2024 Exam Important Dates Application Begin : 24/06/2024Last Date for Apply Online : 27/07/2024 upto 11 PM OnlyOnline Fee Payment Last Date : 28/07/2024Correction Date : 10-11 August 2024Exam Date Tier I : 09-26 September 2024Admit Card Available : Before ExamTier I Answer Key Released : 03/10/2024Tier I Result Available : 05/12/2024Tier I Marks Available : 16/12/2024Tier II Exam Date : 18-20 January 2025Exam City Available : 09/01/2025Admit Card Available : 14/01/2025 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS: 100/-SC / ST / PH : 0/- (Nil)All Category Female : 0/- (Exempted)Correction Fee First Time : 200/-Correction Fee Second Time : 500/-Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking, UPI Fee Mode Only.
